attributes.action: Revoke our Extradition treaty with the US which allows immediate transfere of UK nationals to the US
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned require the immediate removal of the Extradition arrangement with the US which allows any UK citizen to be extradited to the US with absolutly no evidence. The fact that the US has no intention of ever reciprocating the arrangement is in it's self a reason to revoke it, however none should have to be extradited to a non EU state without a single shred of evidence. Also to extradite someone from the UK when under UK law there may not have been an offence is not acceptable.

rejection.details: A petition requires your full name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
